desc: Pure Natural Moisturizing Handmade Shea Butter Ethically Sourced

layout.text: Care for your skin by giving back.

Indulge in a luxurious skincare experience while uplifting an entire community behind you. Shea Yeleen nourishes more than just your skin. We are a global network of sisterhood that enables women to lift up other women through treating themselves to high quality, all-natural skincare. Your skin will thank you.
